title: Tech Shops
content: My favorite tech shop is Micro Center in St. Louis Park.

title: Too Many Keyboards
content: Let me tell you about my keyboard situation. It all started when my son wanted to get a super cool keyboard that clicks. With every new keyboard comes a used one that wasn't sufficient.

title: Data, data, data
content: With the advent of digital everything comes the issue, what to do with all the data. Digital photos, digital contracts, digital music and more...
